response.overview: Motel for Lovers is obviously the brainstorm of some Seventies genius who discovered the intimate connection between motels and sex. The premise must have seemed like such a winner that the need for a story was deemed extraneous. So look for SUZANNE FIELDS (Flesh Gordon), fresh out of high school, in Room 121 and RAINBOW ROBBINS (Marriage and Other Four-Letter Words) engaged in a threesome in Room 123. Rooms go for $12 a night, no questions asked. Any questions?
response.title: Motel For Lovers
